name: Heart of the Woods: Collector's Edition
description: Kickstarter-exclusive box that comes with the game, original soundtrack, and a custom box along with other goodies like a fairy keychain, postcard, digipak, and enamel pin.

name: Head Games and Tank Battle Retro
description: Sin descripción

name: Urban Flow: London Rules
description: Sin descripción

name: Welcome to Genius High!
description:
A natural thinker with the ability to assess any situation, identify the optimal strategy, and execute it in the blink of an eye...

You are a true genius.

Until now, you’ve never met an equal, but all that’s about to change when you’re drafted into an elite school that caters solely to the skills of those like you…

name: FNF Big Chungus Mod Piano Tiles
description: Sin descripción

name: Mario Kart SX
description:
What if Nintendo created a DLC track pack for Super Mario Kart in 1992? The aim of this hack is to make a compliment to the original game. Super Mario Kart featured courses named for Mario, Koopa and Bowser. This has new themes for the other 5 characters plus a revamp of the Mario, Bowser and Rainbow Road courses. In addition to 20 all-new standard tracks, it also features 4 new battle courses.

The roster is mostly the same but Donkey Kong Jr. has been replaced with regular Donkey Kong and Koopa is replaced with Paratroopa.

name: Ren the Summoner and the Erotic Dungeon
description: Small fry with 0 attack power, “Ren” is a kind hearted summoner girl. However, a friend and summoner of the same village, “Croad’s” lover was killed by a rampant monster in the past, and with vengeance against all monsters, he thinks of a “Monster Eradication Plan”

name: Wario Land 4: Parallel World
description:
A complete rom hack of Wario Land 4, released on the date of 20th Anniversary for Wario Land 4.

It features remixed levels and bosses based on their original concept, new difficulty modes and newly added music.

name: Horror Break
description: Horror Break is an arcade game that lets the user knock out horror themed items with a unique machete paddle and human eye ball. Unique Animated levels, Mini-Bosses and Powerups to collect as you progress through the levels. Thirty Levels to compete in and battle mini bosses on your way to victory. Single player fun and arcade style entertainment.

name: Undercurrent
description: An adventure indie horror game by Dave_ja. Part of the Haunted PS1's Summer Of Shivers Jam.

name: Hina-chan's Big Trade! Millionaire Lunch
description: With no offers to be in the mainline games, Hina-chan finally finds herself with no more than a single cucumber in her fridge. Help her by searching for and trading all sorts of items to various humans and youkai to get enough food to make her lunch a rich one!

name: Koikatsu Sunshine
description: "Koikatsu Sunshine" revolves in the player (a male) going into vacation in a paradisiac southern Japanese island with his colleagues from an all-girl’s school with the objective to develop relationships with the girls.

name: Crowned
description: Crowned is an innovative MOBA game, combining stunningly simple mobile controls with deeply strategic & tactical gameplay. Brought down to the essence of esports: High tension from the first second, ultra addictive competition, wrapped in quick matches. A mobile-first MOBA game: Enjoy esports anytime, anywhere.

name: Misfiction
description: A short horror parody game that takes a quip at a common BL trope

name: Boom Guys
description: Boom Guys is an online PVP shooting brawl where up to 32 players can choose to compete in different modes.

name: My Village Life
description: My Village Life is a open world village simulator vehicle driving game.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Character 2: Jack-O'
description: This allows the character Jack-O' to be used in-game.

name: Escape from the Lockdown: The Demon Fortress
description: Team up with the 9 heroes as the 'Puzzle Solving Hero' and solve the mysteries of the Demon Fortress!

name: Midnight Calling: Valeria Collector's Edition
description: The world is freezing!

name: Paladin's Quest
description: Non-linear dramatic story about a paladin that left his home monastery for the first time to go on quest. The quest appeared harder that paladin throught: she is haunted by demons now, and the only people who coul help her - ancient rivals of paladins, the Duids.

name: Devil's Gold
description: Jeremy have signed contract with the devil. For whatever reason it might be, now he gotta pay the price. And we all know how expensive a devil loan's interest can be.

name: Inno Vation! 2007
description: Steam port of "INO VATION! 2007" by Omega

name: Zoffice
description:
Hey! Thanks so much for applying to work with us at Zoffice! I'm Paige and I can't wait to show you around!

First off, everyone here's great. We have Nick up front with security, our tech wiz Jessica, ME, and Theo who's . . . having a hard time adjusting. Why don't you swing on by today, it's gonna be a pretty big one for me and my team! Oh, and watch out for the zombies on your way in...

name: Dream Girls Collection
description: Hello! We want to meet you! There are different animal girls among us, we live in different biomes, and we have different habits and characters. Someone is gentle, and it is better not to get close to someone. Who do you like the most?

name: Project Venus.RP
description: "Project Venus.RP" is a type of memory flop casual games.Players interact with AI girls in the Venus system, guide them to learn the relevant knowledge, and eventually they will have a different ending.

name: Survival Night
description: Survival game where you explore and build. Survive nature's events like acid rain, meteor crashes, zombie eclipses and more. Unlock new maps and characters with special abilities.

name: Dodge It!
description: Welcome to Dodge It! if you want to relax this games is not made for you, only the best from all over the world can be in the leaderboard of this games. Do you have enough strength to be #1?

name: Iraq War
description: Take to the streets for intense combat near and far, where the survival of the team depends on domination of the flag

name: The Shape of Time
description: This virtual exhibition has one goal: In half an hour, it will drastically alter your understanding of what time is.

name: Power Pals
description: Become a Power Pal and help the team save their children from the evil Blitterbom. Power Pals is an arcade style platformer with a cute family friendly atmosphere. Play through increasingly difficult levels as one of the 5 Power Pals.

name: Dungeon Warriors
description: It is a 3D RPG idle game. The game integrates RPG elements, with skill system, achievement system and very rich equipment system, so that players can experience diversified role-playing fun.

name: Ragtag Racing
description: Start your engines and join the mayhem in Ragtag Racing. Choose your whacky racer and try to complete all 15 tracks without running out of fuel.

name: Zombie Killer Drift: Racing Survival
description: Welcome in the fantastic open world of Zombie Killer Drift - Racing Survival. The zombie tsunami is already here! Zombies roam the country and there is almost no escape.

name: Heart Lock: A Free Metroid Inspired Game
description: Enter this crafting-driven Metroid-like game to plunge deep into your emotions. You must craft spells to defeat monsters plaguing your heart, and explore a dreamscape to unlock the skills needed to defeat your nemesis.

name: S.P.A.T.
description: You have a unique opportunity to feel like an operator of a special squad to fight paranormal creatures and monsters (Special Paranormal Assault Team - S.P.A.T.). Solve challenging problems with unknown monsters in the dark corners of the earth.

name: Impossible Simplified Cube
description: 8 Level Parkour Game Think You Got What It Takes To Reach The End And Complete The Game!.

name: AirGun
description: AirGun - Top View The game of airplanes in which the player driving his aircraft should shy away from enemy bullets, to pilot between clouds and destroy the waves of enemies. After each killed wave, you can choose a bonus for further passage.

name: Robo Go
description: Imagine that you are a small robot capable of overcoming many obstacles, but would you like to? Of course you do! The ROBO GO game is a platformer, in which you have to go through 15 large levels, in each of which something new appears.

name: Clockwork Dungeon
description: Treasure awaits within the dungeon, there are no guards, but the dungeon itself is a challenge. Built to protect the treasures till the end of time, the dungeon’s traps operate like clockwork. Can you get the gold and make it out alive?

name: Aptly Rolling
description: In this game you must roll around in a wacky manner collecting shapes to increase your mass and eat other players. Compete for the top spot on the leaderboard!

name: The Stone of God
description: Dei Lapis is a legendary stone, said to have been created by the creator of the universe. The stone carries his power of ultimate creation and for generations it has been the object of pursuit of many who wished to use it's power, some for good, some for evil.

name: Hammer 2 Reloaded
description: Enjoy intense action in this third-person shooter action game. Your job is to clean city of crime in mutiple missions, each one with its own goal. The game features a fully Open World Environment. Improve your arsenal in the dedicated shop with cash you gained from previous missions.

name: Wisly and the Chickens!
description: Wisly and the Chickens! Is an 2D platform runner. The game tells the comical history of the chicken coop revolt against a lovely weasel. Help Wisly to find the cage parts to capture the evil Galinacio and thus to explain to the chickens this big misunderstanding. Let's RUN!

name: Jerma's Big Adventure
description: Oh no! Jerma985 has fallen into a spooky cavern filled with ROBOT dinosaurs and EVIL warlocks. In this wacky action-platformer, fight to escape the treacherous cavern while a live studio chat cheers you on!

name: Timothy's Night
description:
Timothy's Night: an open world video game full of action and adventure.
Timothy had a pretty normal childhood for a gangster, except for the part where he was abducted. When he was just a kid, he was taken by these weird-looking beings who gave him superpowers. Since then, Timothy's done nothing except use those powers for his own benefit and now he controls the whole city. What Timothy neglected to remember was the part where aliens would come to conquer Earth... and now he's the scoundrel who has to save us all.

name: Ambush
description: Ambush is a party game up to 2-8 players in local multiplayer. Stay hidden in a crowd, spot players among the AIs, and slice them up with your freshly sharpened katana. Strategy and violence will be part of the game.

name: Take town
description: Urban Planning Simulator (puzzle) build and manage your city! You are the mayor of a small town develop it and earn money.

name: Obsideo
description: Obsideo is a 1-4 player online co-op psychological horror, where you and your team of priests explore different locations experiencing paranormal events in an attempt to figure out what ghost they're dealing with and exorcise it from the property.

name: Am Madness
description:
Your Omega protection has been stolen. Attempt to escape the first signs of madness, in a hard, unforgiving, 2D platformer. Inspired by classics such as Manic Miner and Jet Set Willy, with a modern twist. Face the darkness, escape The Madness.

Features:
28 levels of The Madness: 9 normal, 9 dark curse variations, 9 madness variations and a hidden level for those who enjoy the rain!

A haunting soundtrack by "Last Child Left", including his beautifully melancholy "Moonlight Sonata" remake!

Retro inspired gameplay with some comforting modern additions.

Face The Madness on three distinct difficulty modes:
Easy Difficulty - Face The Madness with two lives but gain an additional life after each level completion, until you reach the dark curse level variations

Normal Difficulty - Face the madness with three lives and escape both normal and dark curse level variations

Madness Difficulty (unlocked by beating The Madness on normal difficulty) - Face The Madness with just one life and play through The Madness level variations

name: GlassSmash 2
description: GlassSmash 2 is the sequel of the puzzle game where you have to smash all glass objects by sledgehammer.

name: Strawberry Chocolate: Miner 8AD 4SS
description: The Strawberry Chocolate is your ship. You are a top asteroid miner. Is a hostile ecosystem of predator slugs a concern? Of course not. In this action RPG, get out there and hunt for all the different minerals you need and destroy any predators that get in your way. You are a Miner Badass.

name: Sicko Island
description: Sicko Island is a survival, horror game where you'll need to find essential items, solve puzzles and fight your way to the General to put an end to the nightmare.

name: Rent's Due: The Game
description: Rent's Due: The Game is a third-person platformer game where you take control of protagonist Tesha Robinson. Tesha is in need of some money and in order to get it, she must complete different levels with various obstacles that provide a huge challenge.

name: Tealerland
description: In this FNAF inspired game you will use T-Lure to contain animatronics while the power goes out or animatronics bang at your door. Climb down a ladder into your office with dangers on the way.

name: Instant Sports Paradise
description: Instant Sports Paradise makes the sun shine bright on your family workouts! Travel to the other side of the planet and enjoy an experience up to to 4 local players, all on your cosy couch.

name: Drone Gladiator
description: New era of gladiator battle shows has come, era of robots! And you have a chance to participate in it! Drone Gladiator is an arena shooter, where you upgrade your drone, fight giant bosses and participate in random events.

name: Witty witch
description: Witty witch is a 2D puzzle platformer with handpainted graphics. Suitable for a wide audience of all ages and preferences. 100 levels, filled with a variety of monsters will force you to show ingenuity and dexterity. And a funny story will give motivation to reach the end.

name: Codemasters Collection 1
description:
Introducing the Codemasters Collection 1 Cartridge for Evercade; 17 of the most renowned games in British gaming history including Sensible Soccer, Cannon Fodder, Linus Spacehead, and an unreleased title, Tennis All-Stars.

Games Included:
- Sensible Soccer - International Edition (Championship Soccer '94 in North America)
- Cannon Fodder
- Big Nose Freaks Out
- Tennis All-Stars (released as Pete Sampras Tennis)
- Mega-Lo-Mania
- Big Nose the Caveman
- Cosmic Spacehead
- Psycho Pinball
- Bee 52
- MiG 29 - Soviet Fighter
- The Ultimate Stuntman
- Super Skidmarks
- Boomerang Kid
- Linus Spacehead
- CJ’s Elephant Antics
- F-16 Renegade
- Stunt Buggies

name: Mega Cat Studios Collection 2
description:
The Mega Cat Studios Collection 2 cartridge brings 8 more classic Mega Cat Studios games to the Evercade! Great independent titles such as Roniu’s Tale, Yazzie, Misplaced, Arkagis Revolution and more are brought together in a retro style, collectable physical package.

Included Games:
- Alter Ego Dreamwalker
- Arkagis Revolution
- DevWill Too
- Gluf
- Misplaced
- Romeow & Julicat
- Roniu’s Tale
- Yazzie

name: Space Station Sprint
description: Space Station Sprint is a fast paced sci-fi first person shooter. Infiltrate each space station and complete your objective before your escape ship is spotted by the enemy space station. Find permanent upgrades, secondary objectives, and secrets in each level!

name: Tormented Souls
description: Classic survival horror is back! Inspired by the original Resident Evil and Alone in the Dark series, Tormented Souls modernizes with a fresh twist on the fixed perspective adventure. While investigating the disappearance of twin girls at Winterlake, something terrible happens to Caroline Walker. Waking in the dead of night, naked and hooked up to some kind of outdated medical equipment in a bathtub, Caroline must fight for her life as she explores the halls of the abandoned mansion.

name: Kiss Trilogy: Premium Edition
description:
Box contents:
- Game: Hotch Kiss, Kiss Bell, and Kiss Ato
- Special Package Art Illustration
- Hotch Kiss Original Soundtrack CD "Sweet Kiss"
- Kiss Bell Original Soundtrack CD "Smile Kiss"
- Kiss Ato Original Soundtrack CD "Melty Kiss"
- Kiss Bell's PlayStation Opening "Kissing Bell"
- Kiss Ato‘s PlayStation Opening "Sweet Sympathy"

name: Mad Streets
description: A physics-based couch multiplayer fighter game, casting a wide variety of characters and combat to bring a memorable beat-em-up party experience. Pick up some controllers and settle the score, in Mad Streets!

name: Wargs
description: Wargs is an indie MOBA with game mechanics that are inspired by massively multiplayer games like Perpetuum and Eve. WARNING! Steep learning curve ahead, but you'll be just fine if you played one of those previously mentioned titles.

name: No More Heroes III
description:
The latest numbered entry in the No More Heroes series.

Fight your way to the top of the Galactic Superhero Rankings!
The legendary assassin Travis Touchdown makes his glorious return to the Madness in the No More Heroes 3 game, exclusively on the Nintendo Switch system!

name: Lamentum
description:
Lamentum is a pixel art survival-horror game set in New England in the mid-nineteenth century. To solve the dark secret at the heart of Grau Hill Mansion, you will have to immerse yourself in a nightmare world full of terrible creatures.

Choose well in whom to trust, every decision you make may alter the course of the story.

Will you survive?

name: Atlantic '41
description:
Atlantic '41 is an upcoming World War 2 U-boat simulation for the Playdate console. Take command of a German submarine during the early years of the conflict and hunt convoys in the Atlantic and the Mediterranean.

Make sure you know your boat inside and out, take good care of your crew, and try to survive the war as the Allies develop better weapons and detection systems against the U-boat peril.

name: Hakuoki Shinkai Reimeiroku - Limited Edition
description:
The Hakuoki Shinkai Reimeiroku - Limited Edition includes:
- Switch game "Hakuouki Reimeiroku"
- Special illustration box
- Original soundtrack with bonus radio drama
- Special cloth poster
- Badge Character acrylic stand

name: Boule Petanque
description: Boule Petanque is a VR sports game that makes you play boules or pétanque or boccia. No matter what the weather is like, the sun always shines on the square in the game. In the relaxed atmosphere of a square that could be like this in the south of France, you can throw the jack and the balls. In single player mode you learn how to do it, in multi-player mode you can compete against other players. These can be friends or random players all over the world. Special is certainly the sound of the game: the birds twitter, the bullets bang and immediately you are in another world.

name: Tower War: Tactical Conquest
description: Turn the tide and win the war in this elegantly simple casual tactics game that's guaranteed to appeal to all armchair commanders and pocket Napoleons.

name: Groove Coaster: Wai Wai Party!!!! - Touhou Project Arrangements Pack 6
description: Sin descripción

name: Dreamgame
description: Dreamgame is a non-traditional Yume Nikki fangame. The goal of the game is to explore the game's world and reach the ending. The player can interact with the environment by moving around onto objects.

name: Super Animal Royale: Season 1
description: This is the third released battle pass. It started with the release of v1.0 and ended on December 14, 2021.

name: Turnip Boy Commits Tax Evasion: The Sunset Station Update
description: The Sunset Station update features a rogue-lite infinite train dungeon known as the Limitless Line that has you battle new and upgraded familiar enemies for a bevy of rewards. The Limitless Line features vast prizes for doing well in the dungeon, including special Trinkets that aid you during runs. While on the train, you will encounter swarms of foes and much more.

name: Time Defenders
description: A tower defense game by Vespa.

name: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate: Cheregi 2
description: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate, redefining digital puzzling.

name: Hakuoki Shinkai Reimeiroku
description:
This game takes place before main Hakuoki games, during early days of Shinsengumi. You play as a male character and gather not romance affection points like in the other otome games, but friend affection points with Shinsengumi members.
Included in this version of the game, are all the scenarios that were added as extra content in the past ports of this game.

name: Let There Be Cat!
description: Play as a cat, run around and break stuffs!

name: Polyrhythm Mania
description: A game that faithfully recreates the Polyrhythm minigame from Rhythm Tengoku (リズム天国), with a built-in level editor and side modes.

name: 10th Corpse
description: 10th Corpse is a Match 3 game with plenty of fun twists. Enjoy 100 twisted Match3 levels and solve a murder in Mansion Vinterfragen!

name: Medieval Tower Defense
description:
Imagine a world of knights where you must defend the resources of the inhabitants under your protection from the invasion of barbarian hordes. To do this, you will have to manage your budget by acquiring and using the best weapons of the time, catapults and cannons.

Medieval Tower Defense, with its exceptional graphics, will bring you hours of strategic fun....

name: Summer In Mara: Collector's Edition
description:
This edition includes the following:

- Summer in Mara
- Artbook
- Soundtrack
- Nappo Pin
- Acrylic Diorama
- Double-Sided Poster
- Sticker Sheet
- Collector's Box

name: BattleGrounds: War, Tanks and Nukes
description: A military styled action tower-defence game filled with nukes, missiles and tanks. Improve your building, canons and tanks. Purchase stronger ammunition and survive the next wave. Highly replayable, tough and addictive.The fun never ends

name: Beat Arena
description: Strum, strike, and jam away! Liven up your VR gig! Perform on stage in a band as a pianist, a guitarist, a bassist or a drummer, all in VR! Grab your friends' play data and enjoy a VR jam session together! Perform your favorite songs from the BEMANI series in VR!

name: Lovixsama Sokoban Bundle
description:
Nyakamon Adventures — help NyaKaMon to get through challenging levels of sokoban!
ReactorX is a relaxing game about moving boxes on energy grids in a sci-fi setting, in order to repair the space ship which was hit by a meteor.
Easy to play, exactly what you need to rest from the dynamics of big games; Level-design with no dead ends, so you don't have to restart any level except if you really want to start anew; Short animated cutscenes with story elements.

name: Betrayer: Curse of the Spine
description: Betrayer: Curse of the Spine is an Action-Adventure Metroidvania. The game features decision making, crafting, fast-paced combat, multiple endings, intricate storytelling, an open world to explore, and more!

name: Base Defense VR
description: A classic tower defense game made for VR!

name: Team Sonic Racing: 30th Anniversary Edition
description: Team Sonic Racing combines the best elements of arcade and fast-paced competitive style racing as you face-off with friends in intense multiplayer racing. Race together and work together as a team by sharing power-ups and speed boosts. Take control of your racing style. Choose from 3 distinct character types and unlock game-changing vehicle customization options to suit your racing style. Speed up. Gear Up – Team Racing at Sonic Speed!

name: I am an Air Traffic Controller 4: Airport Naha - Roah
description:
This product (ATC4: Airport NAHA [ROAH]) is DLC for "I am an Air Traffic Controller 4".
This DLC includes control of Naha Airport in Naha City, Okinawa, Japan and the adjacent Naha Air Base, as well as other military aircraft flying around the airport.

name: Der Geisterjäger: The Ghost Hunter
description: Pilot your own mech, explore the dungeon set in a dying sci-fi world, and survive through harsh turn-based battles in this brutal dungeon crawler.

name: Darkland II
description: Sin descripción

name: Hentai Waifu Girls
description: «Hentai Waifu Girls» - is an addictive hentai game that combines beautiful art, good music and interesting puzzle mechanics! If you want to relax after a hard day - this game is definitely for you!

name: Spaceship War
description: Spaceship War is a scrolling shooter with a top view, in which you have to control one of three combat starships with the aim of total annihilation of a potential enemy! Pick up upgrades, dodge crowds of enemy equipment and show the whole cosmos who is really its true king!

name: Plush Madness
description: A summoning has gone wrong.Now the house and all plushies are possessed. Can you make it through the maze, activate all symbols and defeat the demon? Plush Madness is a Horror Fighting Game optimized for VR and playable for Flatscreen too.

name: Hampuzz
description: match3 puzzle action game！ Press the block. Climb the block. Erase the block. Let's aim for the goal! Simple puzzle game！

name: Hop Step Sing! Happy People
description: Have you ever imagined supporting your idols in an intimate way like changing their hairstyles, photo shooting for them, or lighting up their stage in VR space? 《Happy People》 is the ultimate interactive entertainment that can fulfill your dream!

name: Farm Kitten: Puzzle Pipes
description: Help the kitten rotate the pipes to bring water to his farm. The more the kitten plants, the more money he has to fulfill his dreams as a cat.

name: Bacteria Wars
description: A real-time strategy game in which you fight to secure the victory of your Bacteria over the Cell Defense Force and other enemy Bacteria in a world where your units are your only resource, and where your mobile base will not be enough to keep you alive.

name: RoboJep
description: RoboJep is a Platforming/Physics Based Puzzle Game. Fly through obstacles and solve small puzzles as the narrator shout encouragements at you.

name: EFO: Escape From Outerworld
description: EFO is a side scrolling platformer, wherein you control an alien who has crash landed, and must reach the top of the mountain in order to call for a ride home before the battery on your distress beacon runs out. The climb is difficult, but you have the power of telekinesis!

name: Captures
description: A chess-based puzzle game.

name: Googass
description: This is a sci-fi RPG type game inspired by things such as Final Fantasy and Die Hard. It is a party based RPG maker game with 7 playable characters.

name: Witch Stone
description: Witch Stone - arcade game from the subgenre 3 in a row, made in 2D hand-drawn graphics.

name: Rue
description: A puzzle card game where all the players are sitting around a table. A rose appears on the table that moves around. The aim of the game is for each player to have the rose in front of them at the end of the round. Each player can use cards that influence the rose’s movement.

name: Plunger Simulator
description: Plunger simulator is a very relatable simulator. Plunge the turds down into the watery depths below with your trusty plunger, then flush to finish them off. Be careful, the turds like to pop back up, and can cause a toilet to overflow!

name: Battle Steed: Gunma
description: BATTLE STEED:GUNMA is a team battle TPS game implemented with giant robots. Join as a mercenary and win with your team in the battle that takes place in a competition between military companies from each countries to acquire new resources discovered on the space planets in the near future.

name: Cape's Escape Game 3rd Room
description: Cape's Escape Game 3rd Room is a short adventure game in the Cape's Escape series, which you can complete in an hour or so. Solve the mystery and escape from the room. Once you manage to escape from the convenience store, you'll be able to take the game for a new spin with some new puzzles as you search for a set of hidden cards.

name: Magical Girls Second Magic
description: " Magical Girls Second Magic" features cute girl characters ranging from magical girls to girls with furry cat ears.This is a unique block-busting game in which you destroy all the blocks placed on the stage to evolve the illustrations of cute girl characters.

name: Arcade Archives: Space Cruiser
description: Space Cruiser is a shooter released by Taito in 1981. Players take on the role of a Space Cruiser captain in 2100 AD, patrolling space to ensure peace on Earth. Intercept enemies, go beyond the asteroid belt, and power up your ship at space stations!

name: Titans Black Ops
description: Titans Black Ops is a 2D jump n gun about mercenaries trying to save the world and then go home and take a well-deserved nap. Choose your gun, purchase an arsenal of powerful more guns and grenades then blow EVERYTHING up and save the world by the way. Lock and load!

name: Puzzletronics
description: In this game you will have the experience of moving pieces to form an electronic circuit, while listening to a calm and relaxing soundtrack. This game is not an electronic circuit simulator but it will be a lot of fun to use electronics in this game.

name: Ann
description: Ann, an art student finds herself trapped in the school when she accidentally broke one of the school's rules. With the help of the school's security guard, help Ann navigate her way out and uncover the secrets of the school before she becomes a permanent resident of the school.

name: Whispers in the Dark
description: Whispers in the Dark is a mystical horror game in which you have to find yourself face to face with impenetrable darkness and what it keeps in itself. The nightmares of the past will come to life and will try with all their might to destroy you. Fear the whispers in the dark!

name: Cube-e 2
description: 2D shooter about robots for one and two players, made in stylish hand-drawn graphics.

name: Tropico 6: Festival
description:
Tropico 6: Festival challenges players to channel their creativity by planning and managing a series of celebrations, whilst combating 'The Boredom' – an evil, fun-fighting-force that threatens to thwart all festivities on the sun-soaked isles of Tropico.

Tropico 6: Festival also adds a unique party planning mechanic to Tropico 6, allowing players to host 20+ types of festival. Four distinctive, themed areas will be included for players to throw spectacular shindigs, as well as new buildings such as the Dance School, Balloon and Fireworks factory to get the party started. Players will also be able to enjoy a host of new musical additions, alongside a snazzy party outfit (and paint job) for El Prez and the presidential palace.

name: Hot Tub Simulator
description: Hot Tub Simulator is an idle simualtion game made by Mitsuki Game Studio.

name: Peter's Day Out
description: Peter's Day Out is a short narrative game about a cat searching for the perfect birthday present for his human. Explore the little beach town and help the citizens in this fun, lighthearted adventure.

name: Witch Hunter
description:
Witch Hunter is a 2D endless runner game. Play as 'Wolf', a famous monster slayer on his last adventure to redeem his name and become the most famous of his kind against hordes of creatures from dark forests.

Have no mercy against every last monster standing in your way to boost your score while collecting coins to upgrade power-ups hidden all across the dark forests.

Shop
The player collects coins which allows them to purchase upgrades from the in-game shop. These upgrades aid progression against the trophies.

name: Dark Thrones
description:
Dark Thrones is a 2D endless runner game. You play as 'Dark', an assassin on his last run to redeem himself and protect those he loves against legions of undead on top of an endless wall.

Jump over and slide under various obstacles. Have no mercy against every last unyielding enemy standing in your way to boost your score while collecting coins to upgrade power-ups strewn all across the wall.

Shop
The player collects coins which allows them to purchase upgrades from the in-game shop. These upgrades aid progression against the trophies.

name: Neptunia x Senran Kagura: Ninja Wars - Day One Edition
description: The limited day one edition includes an exclusive IFI Online Store trading card.

name: Off the Road: Unleashed
description: Immerse yourself in realistic sandbox environments all filled with challenging tasks and collectables. Sand dunes, frozen plains, mountains to climb and conquer. Explore 5 worlds with your favorite vehicle or just take a hike on foot!

name: Last Light
description: En route to a scare game, Lumi realizes that she is suddenly alone. Then, suddenly appears the old abandoned hospital... Explore throughout the tragedy-stricken hospital. Search for the student IDs of Lumi's classmates. And find out what really happened. Maybe all you need is the courage to "flee?"

name: Sweet Shine
description: This is an exciting casual draw line game. Players can draw different line segments in the game level to direct the flow of balls into the finish hole to complete the level. The 3 cute girls have different story, costumes and props.Enjoy the game and reveal the secret desires of these cute girls.

name: A Winding Path
description: A Winding Path is a hand-drawn adventure game about finding the beauty of the world and enjoying the little things.

name: The Chrono Jotter
description: The Chrono Jotter is a mystery and suspense visual novel that follows the steps of Ran Ibuki, a high-school student, as she investigates against the clock to discover who's killing her new classmates -- and avenge the murder of her girlfriend. Are you ready for this savage feast of life and death?

name: Animal Kart Racer
description:
Fun, fast-paced racing for up to 4 players. Use power-ups and be the first over the finish line in Animal Kart Racer!

Are you ready to accelerate, fire rockets and knock your opponents off the road? Animal Kart Racer is a fast and cheerful racing game that puts your driving skills to the test! Choose your driver from one of 16 comical characters such as a raccoon, beaver, wolf or even a shark or crocodile! Race over 20 exciting tracks full of sharp turns, dangerous obstacles and unexpected surprises. Ram through destructible objects, jump from ramps and try to avoid fallen trees, rocks, ice and oil slicks!

Hit the road, put the pedal to the metal, and enjoy the intense kart racing in different modes. Play individual tracks or compete in tournaments. Play with friends in the local multiplayer mode for 4 players!

name: The Play's the Thing
description: Win fame as a playwright before dark forces bring the curtain down for good! In a city stalked by a deadly curse, how will the power of your pen change the world?

name: Axis Football 2021
description: Axis Football is a simulation-style football game featuring the industry's best franchise mode, massive customization, and realistic gameplay.

name: Wandering Trails: A Hiking Game
description: Wandering Trails is a peaceful experience of venturing for a hike in the great outdoors. There are no goals, enemies, jump scares or achievements. There is only you, nature and your trusty old camera.

name: Medieval Shop Simulator
description: Shop simulator in a medieval setting. You need to create products for sale, along the way equipping and improving your store and your skills.

name: Have a Blast
description: Have a Blast is a high energy, kinetic, multiplayer party game. Battle through the most ridiculously hazardous corners of the galaxy and use your surroundings to your advantage. Outmaneuver your frenemies and shatter them into colorful bits.

name: Cats in Time
description: A relaxing puzzle game in which you explore 3D dioramas, solve puzzles and save cats lost in time! Crazy, right?!

name: Reshaping Mars
description: Reshaping Mars is a colony simulation game on Mars, you will start by gathering resources, storing food, accepting immigrants, and building a better colony together. Develop powerful technologies for Mars Reshaping, make Mars great agai..sorry, just great. Don't forget to make the residents happy.

name: Green Phoenix
description: Green Phoenix is an on-rails 3D space shooter mixed with a deep narrative experience that focuses on the concept of ego and the meaning of freedom. In Green Phoenix, we are transported to a single player story where society is fully technologized and authoritarian and take us on the role of the spaceship AI, Green Phoenix, as it remembers its dead pilot, Dana, and embarks on a journey of revenge.

name: Since Memories: Off the Starry Sky - Limited Edition
description:
The Limited Edition contains:

- SINce Memories: Off the Starry Sky game
- Art book
- Soundtrack CD

name: Kakenuke Seishun Sparking!: Limited Edition
description:
The limited edition comes with:
- Game: Kakenuke Seishun Sparking!
- Acrylic Figure
- B2 Tapestry
- Water Resistant Clear Case

name: Kakenuke Forward to Our Sparking Youth!
description: What does "youth" mean to you? Is it a time in your life meant for having fun? For devoting yourself to a cause? For Yuu Tono, it's meant earning money and studying to build a brighter future for him and his family. But maybe the new (or maybe old?) friend who's come into his life will change that.

name: Kami-sama no you na Kimi he: Limited Edition
description:
The limited edition includes:
- Game: Kami-sama no You na Kimi he
- Tapestry x3

name: Kami-sama no you na Kimi he
description:
Shimae Kaito, a young man gifted with a talent for hacking.

Despite being merely a student, Kaito broke through the most advanced security system and gained administrative privileges to the C-AI (Central AI) that governs countless AI. In this day and age, the majority of the infrastructure essential to humanity's daily living has been optimized with AI. Kaito, who now had the power to do anything, issued his command:

“I want to meet a girl who loves me, Shimae Kaito! She has to have large, cute eyes, be kind, and will spoil me, oh, and have big boobs!”

However, the reply came back, "No qualified persons found. Displaying results: 0 out of 0."

Kaito was dejected when his search got no hits, but the AI activated a late-night robot factory and built a robot according to his specifications.

Some days later, a girl who looked exactly as he described showed up at his door - Tsukuyomi. She had superhuman physical abilities and loved Kaito immensely. However, being an AI, she lacked all common sense. Having determined that she still fell short of being his ideal, she decided that she had to express her "love" for him in the most perfect way possible.

-You, who are like a God-

What future waits for Kaito and his ideal (albeit robot) girl?

name: Senran Nin Nin Ninja Taisen Neptune: Shoujo-tachi no Kyouen - Nep-Nep Shinobi Moe Box
description:
The Nep-Nep Shinobi Moe Box is a Japan-only release that includes:

- Game: Senran Nin Nin Ninja Taisen Neptune: Shoujo-tachi no Kyouen
- Tsunako x Nan Yaegashi mirrored jacket box
- Full-color visual book
- Soundtrack CD

name: Blade & Soul 2
description: Blade and Soul 2 is the sequel to the fantasy martial-arts MMORPG, continuing fast-paced, real-time combat from the first game. Developed by NCSoft for Android and iOS mobile devices, Blade and Soul 2 takes beloved parts from the original and infuses the core gameplay with new zones, new characters, and new features. developed from the ground up.

name: Ampersat
description: A shooty, slashy, RPG-y game mixing retro and modern sensibilities. A blend of influences from Gauntlet & Smash TV to Zelda & Angband, battle ASCII creatures in colorful areas & free letters to return language to the village.

name: Marfusha
description: A high-tempo shooting game with simple controls! Upgrade your character with cards and defend the gates from your enemies.

name: Tsukihime: A Piece of Blue Glass Moon
description: A remake of Type-Moon's classic doujin game Tsukihime, featuring a rewritten scenario with major differences in its setting and plot, as well as several new characters.

name: Watch Your Ride
description: Watch Your Ride is a game to challenge your biking experience. Choose your character and bicycle to test your skills and win a cup. Race to the finish line as fast as you can and try not to crash. Enjoy your ride!

name: Assimilate! (A Party Game)
description: Play with 5-10 players online or locally in this 50s-themed, social deduction party game about a cleverly-disguised robot infiltrating a local, "humans only" sockhop!

name: SpookWare
description: Microgames done spooky! Equal parts cute, creepy, and exciting, over 200 microgames across a dozen unique levels. A fast-paced adventure game with a twist.

name: Hermitage: Strange Case Files
description: This gripping paranormal horror adventure revolves around Hermitage, the sinister bookstore that attracts most unusual customers – all of whom seem to be involved in mysterious cases bordering on the paranormal.

name: Nine to Five
description: Nine to Five is a tactical first-person shooter where smart teamwork triumphs over brute force and reflexes. In the game’s near-future world, it’s the corporations that rule, and being a mercenary for them is just another job.

name: Comanche
description: Comanche is a modern team-based online multiplayer helicopter shooter set in the near future. Choose from an array of Comanche and drone configurations, and utilize their strengths to your tactical advantage. Experience a new era of thrilling dog-fights and stealthy drone close quarter action. Hone your skills and compete with other pilots in ranked matches.

name: Sprocket
description: Carefully balance mobility, firepower and armour in a dedicated tank designer. Then uncarefully put them to the test in a series of combat scenarios progressing through the ages of the tank. Here, your limit is what you can fit inside your hull and turret while still being able to move forwards.

name: Black Geyser: Couriers of Darkness
description: Black Geyser: Couriers of Darkness is an isometric, party and XP based, real-time RPG (with pause option) set in the world of Yerengal. A game that combines immersive graphics and brand-new features with virtues of the classic RPGs we all loved! Solve mysteries, fight epic battles, help beggars and kings alike, outwit swindlers and gods, and never forget: greed has many forms and many names!

name: Little Nightmares II: Enhanced Edition
description:
- The Enhanced Edition brings 4K graphics, ray-tracing, and more updates that bring the horrors to life
- You'll need to navigate creepy woodlands, a sinister school, and other hauntingly beautiful surroundings
- There's plenty of puzzles to solve, villains to outsmart, and traps to avoid on your way to the tower

name: Get The Beer
description: Jump & Run game

name: Tank Attack
description:
You are a recruit tank driver, responsible for your own tank.
Your mission is to protect the jungle from enemy tanks, controlled by AI (single-player mode) or by your friend (multi-player mode).

name: Don't Break My Heart
description:
Eradicate as many of Cupid's arrows as possible, so that less people in this world will fall victim
to the endless cycle of sadness and sorrow.

name: War Church
description: Large, spacious military base/stronghold fortifying an old church. The map source is included.

name: Final Fantasy: Sky Warriors
description: An interesting twist on the background history of the original Final Fantasy! This game feature what happened 200 years before the original Final Fantasy 1 for the NES, featuring an unexpected cast of characters otherwise known as the 'Sky Warriors' in the canon game. Witness the catastrophe of the four Fiends of Elements making their grand entrance into the Final Fantasy world, and experience the Lufenian response!

name: The Split
description: The Split is an online two player puzzle experience, designed during quarantine as a way to connect people over the internet.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog Moon
description: The game is an attempt at a mini-crossover with Sailor Moon, in which characters from that universe can be summoned by Sonic and his friends as helper characters with the use of Chaos Emeralds. It takes on an 8-bit Sega Master System style and is designed to look as authentic to the system as possible (I think).

name: E to Are Sore
description: Say the same word with pictures that you can play online! Everyone's answer will be the title of the picture!

name: Absent in the Rain
description:
Mysterious senpai.
A murder case that is crowded with the world.
And a huge fish shadow swimming at my feet...
If all of them were connected together and surrounded me like a ring.
What should I do?

name: Space Wars
description: Space Wars is an exciting endless level-base game in which you control spaceship through multiples levels, trying to shoot down the enemies and avoiding their attacks.

name: Off Day
description: A point & click visual novel about appreciating the little things in life.

name: Minar
description: Take mine-sweeping to the next dimension with Minar. Challenge your brain with 4 game modes, including a classic 2d board just like you remember it! Battle for the highest ranks in the Global Leaderboards! Be the quickest (or smartest) in the world and make your mark! Earn over 40 unique Achievements as you play. Minar is a relaxing 3d puzzle game on the style of 'minesweeper'. The 3rd dimension adds an additional degree of challenge which makes Minar truly unique. The game comes packed with game modes and difficulties, and supports multiple customizations (including themes and skins). Once yours, the game is completely unlocked for you to enjoy to its fullest!

name: Tiger Tank 59 I: Winter Assault MP088
description: "Tiger Tank 59 I Winter Assault" is a top-down shooting game. In this game players need to control their tanks, through the enemy lines, break the enemy base, or defeat the enemy tanks. The DLC include map pack 088.

description: "Tiger Tank 59 I Winter Assault" is a top-down shooting game. In this game players need to control their tanks, through the enemy lines, break the enemy base, or defeat the enemy tanks. The DLC include map pack 090.
