name: Bruv
description: Bruv is a work-in-progress parkour based first person shooter, but you're a tea cup.

name: Any Fish
description: Any Fish is a simple match 3 game, tap screen drag and drop the fish get high score. Made in Construct 2. Enjoy the game!The game has nice graphics and music.Collect as many Jelly as you can and get the most points.Forward!

name: Back of Space
description: A Solar Flare is coming. Deploy drones to backup the internet. Download data, sell data, buy more drones, back up the rest of the internet.

name: Tools Up! Garden Party: Episode 3 - Home Sweet Home
description: Fall is in the air and so is Tools Up! Garden Party's final fall episode! Get ready to pick pumpkins, chase after crunchy leaves, face a new challenger, the Stinky Smog, and much more in Episode 3: Home Sweet Home.

name: Any Candy
description: Any Candy is a simple match 3 game, tap screen drag and drop the candy get high score. Made in Construct 2. Enjoy the game!The game has nice graphics and music.Collect as many Jelly as you can and get the most points.Forward!

name: OneShot: Fading Memory
description: OneShot: Fading memory is an unofficial fan sequel to the puzzle game, OneShot.

name: Beautiful Vikings
description: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts. Enjoy ;-)

name: Surfing and Girls
description: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts. Enjoy ;-)

name: Fantasy Jigsaw Puzzle 3
description: Challenging 6 x 6 jigsaw puzzle featuring epic fantasy female characters.

name: Hentai Jigsaw Girls 3
description: Challenging 6 x 6 jigsaw puzzles featuring hentai girls in summer beach clothing on an anime styled background.

name: Magic defense 2: The Return of the Legend
description: A horde of stupid magical characters want to destroy the stronghold of good magic and become the only owners of magic! You are the only one who can try to stop them!

name: My Life Changed
description: In this game I will tell, through 6 puzzle arts, a little about an event that changed the lives of thousands of people. Play using various features to aid your experience, such as a relaxing soundtrack, different difficulty levels, scene preview, etc.

name: DIY My Boy
description: This is a diy-based leisure and entertainment game. Players can customize the appearance of the boy’s dress, hairstyle, eyes, etc., or upload photos or pictures by themselves to generate a head model, and then choose their favorite body generation New boy.

name: 深渊
description: Sin descripción

name: Crime District
description: The city of Jusan, a fusion of the characteristics of many developed cities, is also the city with the highest crime rate.And you, just a vigilante STG agent, need to find out the truth and get revenge.

name: Mummy, mummy, mummy!
description: Mummy, mummy, mummy! - a puzzle platformer game about mummies, made in 2D hand-drawn graphics.

name: Chariot Land
description: A 3D chariot shooting game The enemy invades, and you fight alone in your chariot.

name: The Sims 4: Industrial Loft Kit
description: Embrace reclaimed architectural design with The Sims 4 Industrial Loft Kit, inspired by the converted warehouses of Brooklyn, New York. Oversized windows, exposed hardware, and sturdy statement pieces highlight the beauty of raw materials and unfinished detailing.

name: T-Minus 30
description: Plan a city and build a space fleet to escape a dying Earth before time runs out. You have 30 minutes to scavenge a post-apocalyptic environment to build infrastructure, grow crops, generate power, and assemble rockets to save as many people as you can.

name: Manifold
description: Stay alive in Manifold as you take to the streets of the city, a challenging Near Future Sci-Fi based Platformer game. Set the highscore by collecting pickups and powerups and staying alive as long as possible to gain the high-score and complete each level.

name: PostItGuess.io
description:
PostitGuess.IO is a free 3D multiplayer web guessing game.

Based on IRL game "What's in my head/ Guess Who am I?" Each player must choose the name of a character that everyone know. This name will be put on the virtual forehead of a player. The goal of the game is to be the first to discover the character that has been assigned to you and that is marked on the post-it note in your head. Each player can ask a question to the others who can only answer with "Yes" or "No".

name: Lightsmith
description: The world has been plunged into eternal night, blanketed in darkness by eerie creatures that cannot survive in the light. Despite the gloom there is still hope as a rare source of light that grows from the ground has emerged, and a gifted few are able to manipulate it to their will; the Lightsmiths.

name: Ghost Blood
description: Ghost Blood is a first-person action game where you must fight the horrors of an abandoned graveyard to learn about ancient secrets and magic. Discover a rich world filled with challenging riddles and lifelike graphics, and emerge as the first of a new generation of magicians.

name: The Rescue Squad
description: The Rescue Squad is a 2d side-scroller game in which the player controls a spaceship and rescues lost astronauts from an infinite number of planets, dodging the soil and debris of unknown planets.

name: Endless Boss Fight
description: Endless Boss Fight is a weird 3D hack'n'slash game. A dishonorable bedouin gets trapped in the cave and now he has to take a fight and beat the host of the cave 16 times.

name: Wet Waifu
description: Wet Waifu is an exciting puzzle game in which you need to draw a line so that water fills a glass. As a reward, you will gradually discover beautiful drawings.

name: The Craft of the Samurai
description: A short visual novel inspired from the works by the masters of Japanese cinema: Masaki Kobayashi, Akira Kurosawa, Hideo Gosha.

name: Hentai Girl Clicker
description: Relax game to keep you in a good mood

name: Rogue Spirit
description: Rogue Spirit is a 3D rogue-lite action game with light stealth elements. Play as the Ghost of the Prince of the Kingdom of Midra, possess enemy characters and absorb their unique skills to fight the evil presence that has corrupted your land.

name: Dungeon Clicker
description: A 3D Idle Action RPG Clicker

name: Behind the Frame: The Finest Scenery
description: A narrative-driven puzzle game about collecting, fixing and painting. Enjoy the scenery en route in the world of Behind the Frame, and search for the secrets within. Recollect memories in the time corridor, and savor some beautiful little moments. Combining escape rooms and narrative games, Behind the Frame: The Finest Scenery presents a profoundly interactive storytelling of characters' emotions and plot development. With 360° panorama techniques and an exquisite hand-painted art style, the game takes you into the world of Behind the Frame.

name: Marvel Future Revolution
description: Marvel Future Revolution is Marvel’s first Open World RPG mobile game, featuring an original storyline with fan-favorite Marvel Super Heroes and Super Villains. Written by veteran comics writer Marc Sumerak (Avengers, Thor, Iron Man, Fantastic Four, Black Panther, Captain Marvel, etc.), Marvel Future Revolution begins with numerous Earths converging across multi-dimensions to form an entirely new ‘Primary Earth.’ As agents of the newly formed ‘Omega Flight’ Super Hero team, players will work together to battle an onslaught of Super Villains, confront their nefarious behaviors and defend the universe.

name: Serin Fate
description: Serin Fate is a pixel-art adventure RPG, with gardening, creature tending, unlockable difficulty modes and classic storytelling! Discover your Magic powers, collect Chimera (regional creatures), and travel the world as a Witch. Inspired by Harvest Moon, Legend of the Seven Stars and Pokemon.

name: Ultimate ADOM: Caverns of Chaos
description: Create your own character or journey into the ever changing depths of the Caverns of Chaos as a legendary hero. Fight monsters, engage in creative necromancy or animate powerful creatures to do your bidding. How you approach the dangers is up to you, but choices have to be made.

name: Volseons
description: Volseons is a turn-based strategy RPG with a rich and vast story, comprised of six epic chapters of intricate plots, lots of monsters to fight and a handful of characters to play!

name: Fallow
description: Isabelline Fallow lived with her sisters in an isolated corner of a world that had begun to forget itself. Soon, it forgot her sisters as well. Now Isabelline walks in her sleep, every morning a new road home, every morning that home a little different than she remembers it. In her dreams, a shadow twists in agony through the smoke-steeped orange sky. With 80+ hand-drawn pixel art backgrounds, explore and solve puzzles across 3 main areas and a hub world, as well as various dreamscapes and secret locations.

name: Mappy Micro Player
description: First released in 1983, MAPPY is the ultimate game of cat and mouse. Guide MAPPY, the police mouse, through the Meowkies mansion to recover all the stolen loot while avoiding cats and using trampolines to complete your mission. With its fun characters and outlandish story line, this arcade classic is sure to be a hit with gamers of all ages!

name: Galaga Micro Player
description: Get ready to face-off­ against bug-like aliens again in this sequel to Galaxian. Galaga was first released in 1981 and is just as popular and beloved as its predecessor but kicks it up a notch with even more awesome space-tastic features.

name: BurgerTime Micro Player
description: Armed with only a pepper shaker, Peter Pepper stepped into the arcade and into our hearts in 1982. Its highly addictive game play, unusual characters, and comedic storyline made BurgerTime an arcade classic. A game that’s still challenging, exceedingly fun, and a shining reminder of the family friendly vibe and excitement that defined the early days of video games.

name: Aliens: Fireteam Elite - Endeavor Veteran Pack
description: Customize your Aliens: Fireteam Elite experience with a pack of over 20 items, including class kit skins, a custom shotgun, weapon colors, head accessories, emotes and more!

name: Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts 2: Elite Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Rally Racing
description: Sin descripción

name: Impossible Isles
description:
A daily map-like puzzle for everyone. Just place the tiles according to simple rules to make your isle & score.
But every day the Imp resets the world - a new pack of tiles, dealt in a new order all day. A new starter map and new wildcard. Even the Imp’s path is the same all day so there’s no luck, it’s all down to your skill at placing each tile to score the maximum. Check your map score against everyone else on the daily leaderboard.
And certain tiles hold secret bonus scores if you can work out how to place them.

name: Humankind: Deluxe Edition
description:
Discover Humankind, a Historical Strategy game where YOU will create your own civilization and re-write the entire narrative of human history. How far will you push Humankind?

The Digital Deluxe edition of the game includes:
- Humankind digital game
- Humankind digital soundtrack (.mp3)
- Unit & Tech tree poster (.pdf)
- Humankind Notre-Dame pack and more!

name: Amane Switch
description: Is there truly such a thing...as a happy ending? Amane Switch is a visual novel game remake updated for international audiences. An adventure game themed around rain, yandere characters, and strange abnormalities.

name: DeadLock
description: In DeadLock, the player must connect the processor and the resources it needs in the appropriate order to prevent 'DeadLock' from occurring. More and more targets need to be scheduled, and new kinds of resources emerge. It's up to the player to efficiently schedule without generating 'Deadlock'.

name: Puzzle Box
description: Puzzle Box - a collection of ten educational and fun puzzle games

name: Hunt: Showdown - Bayou Wraith
description: This DLC contains one Legendary Hunter and two Legendary weapons: Teche Wraith (Legendary Hunter), Wraith’s Hand (Springfield Compact Striker), and Verbena (Knife).

name: Spellarium 7: Match 3 Puzzle
description: Collect coins coins to refuel the 7th element, Time, to stop the world from decaying.

name: Rims Racing: Ultimate Edition
description: Get the ultimate RiMS Racing experience by enjoying all additional content!

name: Freon
description: Freon is a hotseat cooperative shooter made in retro style. Enjoy with your friends and family members.

name: Archer's Adventure
description: 2D cartoon style shooting game

name: Pog 5
description: Cute, minimal physical puzzle.

name: Pixasso 2
description: "PIXASSO 2" - is a new game of relaxing franchise for lovers of the coloring pixel art. More colors! More pictures! More fun!

name: Police Sentri
description: Cop & Robber + Hide & Seek multiplayer co-op madness! Catch all robbers to win the game as a policeman or hold the ‘money bag’ while evading the police until the timer runs out to win as a robber.

name: King of the Pit
description: Many go in, only one comes out. In this battle to death metal are you able to gain the title KING* OF THE PIT? Let your viewers mash and find out who headbangs the best - the ideal way to make raffles and giveaways more exciting! *or queen

name: Panda in the clouds
description: Panda in the clouds is a grid movement platform puzzle game where your challenge will be to reach the flag and fulfill all the objectives of the level.

name: Nightslink
description: You are the Nightslink. Traverse abandoned roads under cover of night. Deliver cassette tapes in a post-apocalyptic world. An atmospheric retro-3D horror adventure.

name: Lake of Shadows
description: A 2D pixel art side-scrolling resource management with some action, looting, and a bit of exploration that mainly focuses on a small area. Defend yourself against the terror of the night inside your settlement by employing some villagers and give them equipment to further strengthen your defenses.

name: Wowowow Korone Box
description: WOWOWOW KORONE BOX is a fangame based off of Cover Corporation’s hololive property. It features Inugami Korone, member of hololive GAMERS. The game is a top-down shooter with the objective of collecting as many Korone Boxes as possible without getting hit even once. Korone must contend with many enemies and boss battles, but is given a variety of weapons to help her survive. The game is inspired by Vlambeer’s Super Crate Box and Nuclear Throne.

name: Destiny 2: Beyond Light - Season of the Lost
description: In Season of the Lost, players will blur the line between technology and magic to find Mara Sov's lost Awoken as they search for answers.

name: Pug With Bomb
description: Pug with Bomb is a game in the genre of the Bomberman series, where the player uses bombs to make his way to collect keys and destroy enemies, simultaneously finding bonuses from blown up wooden walls, which can make it easier for him to play or vice versa to kill.

name: Porter in the Castle
description: Feel like a porter in a medieval castle.

name: Ki11er Clutter
description: The most amazing Clutter yet, with over 1700 puzzles to keep you playing for days and days. So many new Clutter variations mixed in with old favorites for a Quest you'll never forget. The hardest, most challenging Clutter ever - created for your enjoyment!

name: Cave Quest 2
description: Fight back against the underworld by acquiring powerful talents and spells on your journey to save your friends in this exciting and clever Match 3 game!

name: Dagon
description: Face unspeakable horrors. Succumb to madness. Welcome to a truly daemonic narrative experience inspired by H. P. Lovecraft.

name: King's Bounty II: Lord's Edition
description:
The King's Bounty turn-based tactics series returns with King’s Bounty 2! In addition to the tactical depth fans expect from its combat, immerse yourself in the fantasy world of Antara with a whole new, non-linear narrative and deep RPG mechanics that give weight to your every decision.

The King's Bounty II Lord's Edition contains the Main game and the following content:
- Rod of Deception
- Frosthammer
- Staff of Harmony
- Tyrant's Sword
- Armor of the Hollow
- Heroes & Villains Premium Pack

name: Aliens: Fireteam Elite - Deluxe Edition
description: The Deluxe Edition includes the Endeavor Pass + Endeavor Veteran Pack, essentially granting players additional customization options and all future DLC.

name: Revo
description: Revo is a neon styled and classically inspired space shoot 'em up with an original, retro fueled synthwave soundtrack.

name: Embraced by Autumn
description: A sweet romance story with four heroines set in an all-girls’ boarding school in France in 1896, featuring a crossdressing male protagonist.

name: King's Bounty II: King Collector's Edition
description:
This edition includes the following
Game: King's Bounty II [Day One Edition]
Bonus DLC's - Rod of Deception, Frosthammer, Staff of Harmony, Tyrant's Sword
Armor of the Hollow (armor set)
Heroes & Villains Premium Pack and King's Watchdogs (unit).
King’s Crown: A collectible item
Poster: Double-sided poster featuring artwork & map
Soundtrack: Selection of in-game music
Artbook: Hardcover Artbook

name: The Daunting House
description: You are a Paranormal Researcher who accidently crashed in a village near foothills of Himalayas along with his colleague, you find yourself trapped in a chaos. Something seems very strange about this place, you have to make a safe escape, try finding some help in the mysterious house. Good Luck.

name: I Expect You to Die 2
description: Be the elite super spy we’ve been waiting for! The popular escape-the-room virtual reality franchise is back with new missions, more villains, and ingenious puzzles.

name: Calturin
description:
Calturin is a Bullet Hell Boss Rush game where you are resurrected by a necromancer who now holds you in his power. Promised your freedom if you do his bidding, you must traverse the Gauntlet of Portals to unknown lands and conquer deadly beings.

- 10 unique boss fights and 2 paths of pain.
- A compelling story told through fully voiced NPCs.
- Choose how to improve your skills as you become stronger.
- Designed to be suitable for both normal playthrough and speedrunning.

The Gauntlet of Portals Awaits.

name: King's Bounty II: Day One Edition
description:
Legend returns! King’s Bounty II is the long-awaited sequel to the legendary King’s Bounty video games franchise, one of the most iconic representatives of the turn-based RPG genre.

Day One Edition includes:
- Elite Guard Premium Pack
- Armored Prince’s Shield
- Firehand Golems (unit)
- Flaming Eagles (unit)
- Hounds of War Warhorse

name: Hoa
description: Hoa is a platform-adventure game featuring beautiful hand-painted art and a calm, relaxing atmosphere. The game follows the main character, Hoa, as she discovers her own story on a journey through a breathtaking and magical world back to her homeland.

name: City Game Studio
description: You are the founder of your video game company. The starting point belongs to you, in your garage, or think big instead of small by acquiring your first local. At the end of the day, your decisions will make your studio a success and will mark the Video Game History.

name: Psychonauts 2
description: Psychonauts 2 is a mind-bending trip through the strange worlds hiding inside our brains. Freshly-minted special agent and acrobat extraordinaire Razputin “Raz” Aquato returns to unpack emotional baggage and expand mental horizons. Along the way he’ll help new friends, like this magical mote of light voiced (and sung) by Jack Black. Raz must use his powers to unravel dark mysteries about the Psychonauts team and his own family origins.

name: BuildNow GG
description: BuildNow GG is part of an emerging genre of online game that combines tactical building with third-person shooter gameplay, featuring various game modes, weapons, and cosmetic items.

name: Promise
description: Christmas is at the door in snowy Allentown and Duke has promised to collect gifts for Lara. While doing so, he also needs to teach the aliens how one respects wintery holidays.

name: Aliens: Fireteam Elite - Hardened Marine Pack
description:
The Hardened Marine Pack includes the following cosmetic items for your Aliens: Fireteam Elite marine:
Bandana Head Accessory
Digital Red Camo Weapon Color
Adios Weapon Decal
Endeavor Weapon Decal
Flames Weapon Decal
"Chestburster" Joke Emote

name: Meow Tower: Nonogram
description:
Welcome to Meow Tower! Build your very own tower for stray cats.

Solve Nonogram (a.k.a Picross) puzzles to buy furniture and decorate your cats' rooms. Expand the tower and meet more stray cats. If you become friends with the resident cats, they might tell you a secret story!

name: Heavy Hearts
description: Adults only! If humans are near extinction, how do you repopulate? The answer to the question is simple, lots of breeding! The real problem starts when you begin to catch feelings..... Heavy Hearts is full of romance and NSFW goodness. Enjoy!

name: Cats of War
description:
Welcome to a world where CATastrophic events are about to happen - War is coming!
Pick your cat and go up against your friends in epic tank battles across the world.

name: The Elder Scrolls Online: Waking Flame
description: Continue the battle against Mehrunes Dagon and delve into two exciting new dungeons in the next installment of the Gates of Oblivion year-long adventure,The Elder Scrolls Online: Waking Flame.

name: Burger & Frights
description: Burger & Frights is a short horror game in which the player rides a bike throughout a dark forest. The game was inspired by games such as Rides with Strangers, and a certain horror movie by John Carpenter.

name: Station Commander
description: Station Commander is an economy strategy game that has you take control of a futuristic space station. Your goal is to build ships, gather resources, and trade with neighboring planets to upgrade your station and ships. Upgrading your station gives you access to better ships and ship abilities.

name: Physics Cake
description: Physics Cake is a 2-D physics simulation game where you can draw containers, objects, or anything you want really and put whatever chosen physical object you want inside of it.

name: Hentai Jigsaw Puzzle
description: Kawaii girls are broken into pieces. Can you reunite them by completing these jigsaw puzzles?

name: Hentai Gothic Girl
description: Hentai Gothic Girl is a game that can relieve your tension, bringing pleasure with colorful art. To restore the image, you just need to assemble the puzzle by swapping the tiles.

name: Hentai beautiful girls 5
description: This is a puzzle game! In the game, you need to collect a complete image from various small pieces scattered around the screen in random order. Very sexy and beautiful girls are drawn on the images!

name: The Last Journey: 19 Shengli Road
description: Tell the story of a truck driver in the context of modern society. After he accidentally hit a girl in his van. A mysterious monster hunted him. Save the girl. Find help. These experiences are not only experiencing the calamity of reality, but also exploring the truth in his heart.

name: Shattered Reality
description: First person, fast paced shooter, focused on fluid and complex movement set in a stylized, futuristic world, where speed life, and the possibilities are endless

name: Adventurers Guild
description: Adventurers Guild is a tactical RPG where the player manages a guild of adventurers in a dangerous and unpredictable fantasy world.

name: Medieval Wars
description: Real-time strategy. Your lands have been attacked by a horde of evil orcs. They have surrounded the kingdom and are trying to take it away you have the power. But there are countless knights at your disposal who are ready to stand up for their native land.

name: Jubilane
description: Innovative Hexagonal eSports Puzzle Game With Online 1-on-1 Battling! Featuring BG PLATES by Leomi Sadler and Julien Ceccaldi

name: Treasure of Barracuda
description: A Point & Click Puzzle Adventure, exploring the Treasure of Barracuda, a real brick built puzzle box. Solve the riddle using your old your old grandfathers amulet and find the treasures within! Fully buildable and functional in real life as well!

name: Rust 'n Dust
description: Open world, 3rd Person, Action/Adventure. Dynamic characters, intriguing plot and awesome music. Features multiple endings, secret bonus content and much more. Explore the world and uncover secrets that have long been hidden underneath rust and dust.

name: Rabby in the Land of Sweets
description: In this platform adventure game, you will play as the sugar rabbit Rabby on a journey to save the abducted heroine.

name: Mickey Storm and the Cursed Mask
description:
Spy up and save your parents in this action-packed platformer!

Welcome to the world’s greatest waterpark! In this resort full of wild adventures and thrilling waterslides only you, and your sister, can stop the evil Dr. Fisher! Using the powers of a mysterious mask this vicious villain has enchanted the entire park to finally trap your parents. Why? Because they are none other than the world famous Storm spies!

Jump, slide and rush through a series of challenging 2.5D water slides to take down Dr. Fisher and save your parents! But, don’t expect a walk in the park. Because of the curse, all slides are totally OUT OF CONTROL! Each area is filled with dangers, obstacles and enemies waiting for you in each corner, so brace yourself before you’re wiped out. Luckily you’re not in this alone as you’ll be accompanied by your special spy vlogging drone B.U.D.D.Y.

name: Everdale
description: Grow your village and lead your villagers to establish a peaceful, prosperous community in Everdale, a simulation mobile game.

name: Drift King
description: Grab your favorite car, tune it, challenge players in Online Drift battles and become a DRIFT KING!

name: VGL: Imperative
description: You will have to visit the patient's apartment, find out about the agent's disappearance and submit a report to VGL Corporation. The task is easy, but after you enter the apartment, the picture will change and only the goal will remain - to survive!

name: Bird's Eye
description: Bird's Eye is a relaxing card game about building balanced ecosystems.

name: Space Drone: Rescue Mission
description: Space drone is a minimal puzzle game with grid movement where you remotely control a drone to find and rescue your lost mates in space. Be aware to don't be without energy!

name: Luffy: Way Back Home
description: Help Luffy - a little but brave kitten - return home to his family on an extraordinary journey through some stunning, yet dangerous and challenging places, all gathered in this relaxing sliding puzzle game.

name: UFO vs. Bikini
description: Act as an alien driving a UFO and collect materials to upgrade the spacecraft. Kidnap bikini girls, extract purple energy, and study the function of purple energy. Avoid human attacks, strengthen the defense of spacecraft and alien technology.

name: Wizard's Quest
description: A young Wizard travelling with a savory group of friends ventures through the countryside in pursuit of a dark hooded man. Explore the small world of Wizard's Quest with everything you'd expect in a classic JRPG style game!

name: Aliens: Fireteam Elite
description: Set in the iconic Alien universe, Aliens: Fireteam Elite is a cooperative 3rd-person survival shooter that drops your fireteam of hardened marines into a desparate fight to contain the evolving Xenomorph threat. Create and customize your own Colonial Marine, choosing from an extensive variety of classes, weapons, gear and perks, battling overwhelming odds in this heart-pounding survival shooting experience.

name: Mirastell
description: Mirastell is a 2D adventure game with a unique flavor of turn-based combat, set on a mysterious, abandoned space cruise liner. Discover what lead to the fate of the passengers, and earn weapons and items by exploring, and defeating enemies.

name: King's Bounty II
description: The King's Bounty turn-based tactics series returns with King’s Bounty 2! In addition to the tactical depth fans expect from its combat, immerse yourself in the fantasy world of Antara with a whole new, non-linear narrative and deep RPG mechanics that give weight to your every decision.

name: Night Flight
description: Japanese Tomy Pyuuta title, part number 007E, released in 1982.

name: Spin the World
description: Help the bunny get to the goal by spinning the world.

name: Rotational
description: A short platformer where instead of controlling the character, you rotate the stage.

name: The Civvie 11 Massacre
description: 20 new maps created by Civvie's discord in a contest with a hub map.

name: Talparun
description: 3 levels for Hexen in under limit removing ports for Hexen

name: GameMaster
description: Your goal is to explore the facility in order to obtain a keycode, which will allow you to escape! There are many strange and familiar faces that lay within this place, don't be shy.

name: ZJ the Ball: Level 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Guns at Dawn: Arena
description:
Multiplayer shooting game with 1v1 cowboy duels. Survive in west gun battles

Guns at Dawn: Shooter Arena is an action shooter multiplayer for mobiles.
Can you survive in deadly all-out gun battles and be the last gunslinger standing? Grab your weapon and don't miss the shot. Make each bullet count!

name: Mister Twister
description: Play like a tornado and try to get everything in your way! You can take everything from an apple to a house with you if you just get big enough!

name: Friday Night Funkin': Vs. Sonic.Exe
description: Sin descripción

name: I accidently insulted a witch and now all of my clothes are sentient and they hate me!
description: A strange RPG where you have to go round your room, convincing your clothes to be, well, your clothes again.

name: This Trip: Hunted in Forest
description: This trip is a survival horror game from the first person. You love to go geocaching and do this hobby often. But one night everything changes and geocaching takes a completely different turn.

name: In Flames
description: A mystical 2D adventure with a non-linear storyline, in the best traditions of X-Files and Twin Peaks.

name: Endless mahjong
description: Endless mahjong is a game for fans of the mahjong connect genre. Embark on the most endless journey with pleasant relaxing music! The game will generate an endless number of levels for you until you quench your thirst for relaxation and enjoyable gameplay.

name: The Endless Adventure
description: The Endless Adventure - A procedurally generated 2D world creates a unique experience in each of the adventures, collect items, fight underground monsters, arm yourself with the best weapons, armor and shields, drink elixirs, light torches and go as far as you can.

name: Oozing Islands
description: Enjoy freedom of movement in full 3D with no fixed paths in this tower defense and RTS hybrid. Your units are your towers and you can build fences anywhere. Set your units' behavior to create a perfect team of defenders. Two leader boards let you play forever!

name: War of Gold
description: You super hero soldier need save robber gold bars back in this epic battle. Find stolen gold at different levels and beware dangerous enemies

name: Vine Worlds
description: The sequel to 2020's Vine Realms, Vine Worlds is a 3D MMO-like collectathon based on the Vinesauce community. Inspired by walking simulators, embark on a journey by yourself (or up to 200 players on a server) through many worlds, unlock emotes based on the streamers, collect EXP by exploring or playing minigames to spend on cosmetics, and meet hundreds of characters with unique and humourous dialogue.

name: The Skinwalkers
description: The Skinwalkers is an ambient focused retro styled horror game. (Not related to the skinwalker creppy pasta)

name: Xess
description:
Do you like the idea of Chess, but want it to be a bit more and wilder?
Like so much it's maybe too much even?
XESS features 16 characters/factions to choose from, with unique units and setups.

name: On the Go
description: Help the Minis to reach the portal. Solve clever puzzles by placing new tiles and poking the bots. Become the very best Mini-Operator the world has ever seen!

name: Cheese Board
description: A family-friendly game of skill for mobile devices. You move a yellow ball, a giant "ball of cheese", over a play-field full of traps and obstacles. The ball is moved by rolling and tilting your device. Follow the path to earn extra points - or take the shortcut and get your cheese home the easy way. Avoid holes, traps and obstacles. It's a game similar to popular labyrinth marble maze games, and yet it's different!

name: Dps Idle
description: Collect cards, upgrade cards, defeat monsters, join guilds and hire heroes. Raise your DPS!

name: Furious Revenge of Bolo
description: Find the answers to the main questions and learn the whole story of the lone Bolo.

name: Noctambulant
description: Noctambulant is a hand-drawn 2D survival and psychological horror game. Renee moves in with her grandmother after the passing of her parents in a tragic accident. Walk with Renee and unfold the terrifying mystery as to why she was made to go to bed early every night.

name: Report One
description: Report One (Upgrade Edition) is a single player modification from the Report series, for Half-Life, which has an independent universe, saturated with alternative or completely different events, though with some main references to Half-Life 1.

name: Deceased.cable
description: Single map for Boom format made as a tribute to dead.wire by Xaser.

name: Floor Fall
description: Sin descripción

name: Cloacaphobia
description: Cloacaphobia is a 90s VHS found footage survival horror that plays on the fear of sewers, realistic situations and claustrophobic environments with a gruesome atmosphere.

name: Koi
description:
On your way home, you find a koi carp struggling on the ground. But when you drop it in your garden lake it reveals as the Spirit of the Pond...

That's the only thing he remembers. Help him regain his memories and, who knows, you might discover something about you aswell...

name: Super Mario 64 3DS Port
description: Super Mario 64 3DS Port is an unofficial 3DS port of Super Mario 64 using the Mario 64 source code decomp.

name: Dracula's Castle
description: Dracula's Castle is an aftermarket action game for the Sega Game Gear and Sega Mega Drive.

name: Mega Man: Wily Tower
description: Sin descripción

name: GrooVR: Air Drumming
description: GrooVR is a unique VR rhythm game for Oculus Quest where your goal is to hit the beats (represented by small plates) as they are coming at the parts of the drum.

name: NieR:Cogito
description: This game is a non-commercial work, produced for the Nier:Re[in]carnation Content Creator Competition hosted by Square Enix on August 2021. It's an unofficial derivative game made in just 3 weeks about monsters and machines who think they are humans.

name: Forest Song
description: Make a song in the bipsi forest.

name: Hanski's Burlap of Chaos!
description: Hanski's Burlap of Chaos! is an art-fuelled adventure through the burlap's world. Choose your brush - navigate the chaos - clash with the Burlap of Chaos himself - and make a ton of chaotic artwork along the way!!!

name: Galaxy Tales: Story of Rapunzel
description: Fight space pirates with Rapunzel, the Android with the best hair in the world! To protect the precious shelter where the Jimo race lives, the cute alien Rose and Android Rapunzel must go up to the ground floor.

name: Fantasy Jigsaw Puzzle 2
description: Challenging 6 x 6 jigsaw puzzles featuring fantasy male characters.

name: Air Hunter
description: Air Hunter is a challenging game that will give you a battle-field like experience.

name: Creepy Pizza Arcade
description: An arcade of quirky mini-games based on the Creepy Pizza podcast

name: Breaking earth
description: This is a fantastic 3rd person stealth shooter. You have to collect parts for a spaceship to fly away from a dying earth in a post-apocalyptic world. Fighting enemies and mutated spiders will not make you bored in the game.

name: Super Nova Stadium
description: Join other alien contestants in a ricochet battle at the Super Nova Stadium! Chose your blaster, harness solar power to charge your weaponry and knock our your opponents to claim victory! Compete as a team in two game modes: Standoff or Overcharge in intense, ricocheting combat.

name: The Light Will Lead You Home
description:
Play as Brian, a teenage boy living with his parents. You wake up to find yourself trapped in your house with a horrible monster that only has one weakness: light. Can you get out?

A survival horror story-driven game.

name: 100 Hidden Rams
description: 100 Hidden Rams is a hidden object game in a village setting. Black and white hand-drawn graphics in a cartoon style. Interesting and difficult! The clouds are flying by!

name: Cross Maid
description: 互相认错性别的两人，机缘巧合之下开始同居生活 产生羁绊到互相依恋再到自我怀疑，温馨欢乐的短片小故事

name: Negligee: Spring Clean
description: The girls of the Lingerie shop are back and they are in for their toughest day of the year, a mega sale event! How will the girls handle things, you get to decide not only how the sale goes but who you will control in this adult yuri/lesbian themed multi-routed visual novel game.

name: Sefir: Mafia Story
description: Sefir: Mafia Story is a reflex and fast thinking based 2D top down shooter game.

name: Farmer Life Simulator
description: Run your farm , plant , fertilize and harvest crops , or open bigger businesses in the town and have fun living the real life of a farmer .

name: Fossilfuel
description: Fossilfuel is a cyberpunk horror shooter where the player must fight their way through dinosaurs and super soldiers in an open world.

name: The Unexpected Heiress
description: The Unexpected Heiress is the first and only book of the The Unexpected Heiress series.

name: Travel to Mexico
description: Travel to Mexico has an exciting adventure prepared just for you! Buckle up and join the Hudson family on their latest trip to Mexico.

name: Plutonium Mario 64
description:
Plutonium Mario 64 is a major ROM Hack made by usernamesarespiders, featuring 12 main courses with 101 Stars.

Originally dubbed Pluto Mario 64, it was an old Super Mario World hack the creator made years in the past but never was released in public until it was transitioned into Super Mario 64, and the title was named after the dwarf planet orbiting from the Sun, before changing the name after the radioactive chemical metal.

name: Madden NFL 22
description:
Madden NFL 22 is where gameday happens.

All-new features in Franchise include staff management, an enhanced scenario engine, and weekly strategy. Share avatar progress and player class between Face of The Franchise and The Yard with unified progression. And for the first time ever in Ultimate Team, adjust Superstar X-Factors at halftime.

name: The Great Book of Mario
description: The Great Book of Mario is a text hack of Super Paper Mario created by Solargress. The original game's script is placed through oscillating translations on Google Translate, creating a new plot and comedic moments.

name: Garbageboi+
description: As a Garbageboi, you clean the streets while avoiding insane traffic and the deadly stares from the people living there.

name: 2047 CCG
description: Strategic CCG mobile game with a cyberpunk theme.

name: Dog's Muck Island
description: Dog's Muck Island is a short Gameboy game inspired by Link's Awakening's fetch quest. Play in your browser or on a real Gameboy or Analogue Pocket.

description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them. The DLC include map pack 077.

description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them. The DLC include map pack 071.

description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them. The DLC include map pack 075.

description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them. The DLC include map pack 074.

name: The Tower of TigerQiuQiu 2: Ocean M6
description: There are countless treasures and dangers in the deep sea. Drive your detector carefully and find the wealth in the deep. The DLC include full 8 missions.

name: Tiger Tank 59 I: Volcano MP080
description: "Tiger Tank 59" is a top-down shooting game. In this game Players need to control their tanks, through the enemy lines, break the enemy base, or defeat the enemy tanks. The DLC include map pack 080.

name: Tiger Tank 59 I: Volcano MP078
description: "Tiger Tank 59" is a top-down shooting game. In this game Players need to control their tanks, through the enemy lines, break the enemy base, or defeat the enemy tanks. The DLC include map pack 078.

name: Tiger Tank 59 I: Volcano MP072
description: "Tiger Tank 59" is a top-down shooting game. In this game Players need to control their tanks, through the enemy lines, break the enemy base, or defeat the enemy tanks. The DLC include map pack 072.

name: Tiger Tank 59 I: Volcano MP079
description: "Tiger Tank 59" is a top-down shooting game. In this game Players need to control their tanks, through the enemy lines, break the enemy base, or defeat the enemy tanks. The DLC include map pack 079.

name: Tiger Tank 59 I: Volcano MP074
description: "Tiger Tank 59" is a top-down shooting game. In this game Players need to control their tanks, through the enemy lines, break the enemy base, or defeat the enemy tanks. The DLC include map pack 074.

name: Tiger Tank 59 I: Volcano MP076
description: "Tiger Tank 59" is a top-down shooting game. In this game Players need to control their tanks, through the enemy lines, break the enemy base, or defeat the enemy tanks. The DLC include map pack 076.

name: Tiger Tank 59 I: Volcano MP071
description: "Tiger Tank 59" is a top-down shooting game. In this game Players need to control their tanks, through the enemy lines, break the enemy base, or defeat the enemy tanks. The DLC include map pack 071.

name: Tiger Striker: MP041
description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them in the space. The player will destroy the core of the battleship of enemy to win the game. The DLC includes map pack 041.

name: Totally Working Game
description: Inspired by infamous Clicker- type games, TWG is a mixture of casual AFK- point grinder, torture simulator and weird RPG. It allows you to upgrade torture methods, customize the torturing environment, and simply dive into ocean of silly violence against a lame gamedev.

name: Surface: Virtual Detective - Collector's Edition
description: Where are the missing players?

name: Sweet Candy
description: Sweet Candy is a casual game. Everything is done so that you just come in, relax, listen to music and look at beautiful girls. Go through simple levels and discover new girls in your gallery, and then you can sit and admire your collection of girls.

name: A Field of Flowers and Stars
description: A Field of Flowers and Stars is a simple mouse or keyboard-based visual novel.

name: Extreme Speed
description: In the game, players will drive the car and reach the end ahead of time to win.

name: Fishy
description: Fishy is a heartfelt visual novel about friends, enemies, acceptance, and monsters. Explore the aquarium, face your fears, and maybe make a friend.

name: Ohio John: Get Out!
description: Ohio John: Get Out! is a short pixelated platformer adventure inspired by famous characters from the fourth and fifth generations of consoles, also featuring an Infinite Runner mode for extra replay value.

name: Weapons Knight
description: Trapped and wanting to find your way back to the throne, with a multitude of weapons at your disposal and a fleet of enemies that stop you from progressing, you'll have to fight your way through various terrains to then overthrow the wretched king and claim back what was once yours.

name: In the Dark
description: A short 2D metroidvania that explores some darker themes contrasted by bouncy, pixel art visuals.

name: Prank!
description: The story of how practical jokes can spoil the perception of the world

name: The Pilgrim Survival
description: The player shoots at enemies who spawn in endless waves trying to attack him. Gain more kills to score points. There is unlimited ammo, but the player moves slower when shooting so they should be careful. Explore the map to find notable landmarks.

name: C-4
description: Waiting for a match? C-4. Waiting for a render? C-4. Waiting for anything? C-4! Improve your gaming skills while you wait. Mini-games used by professional players to improve the brain response. Your spare time will never be the same with C-4! Runs on top of anything.

name: Shark Pinball
description:
Get ready for Shark Pinball, a pinball machine where you'll try to score points avoiding Sharks, octopus and many other perils, show everybody that you're not affraid of the sea monsters on this table.

Discover all the missions and secrets, in this unique two leveled pinball arcade machine. Complete all the missions and become number 1 in the world or the best among your Friends, posting your high score on the online leaderboard.

name: Pizza Shop Manager
description: Pizza Shop Manager is a unique combination of strategy and simulation game with some economic elements. Do your best to fulfil pizza orders from customers while making enough money to keep your shop open in this fun cooking game. You take the role of Pizzeria Manager. Manage every aspect of your pizzeria and make it become the best eatery in town!!

name: The Bolt Age
description: The Bolt Age is a dynamic action game, full of prodigious retro-futurist designs and shadowy creatures from another dimension. In story mode, the player will enjoy hours of fun with this 3d Cover Shooter. We will put ourselves in the shoes of William Bolt, an intelligent apprentice of science, Nikola Tesla's pupil, but trained in the art of war with the purpose of stopping the announced invasion of inconceivable beings, coming from a dimension of death.

name: Makber
description: Canakkale, Inonu, Sakarya and more. The name of the struggle of the Turkish nation with its noble heroes is the War of Independence.

name: Nayati River
description: A single-player game of adventure and survival, set in a vast region infested with the dead. Build an autonomous camp, manage a community of survivors, look for the many who are missing, fight ferocious hordes, and unravel the mysteries of the legend of Nayati River!

name: Tetris Beat
description:
Tetris Beat: The world famous Tetris puzzle game is blocking to a new beat, fusing its hit gameplay with exclusive music and innovative rhythm mechanics. The game features a diverse and eclectic lineup of incredible musicians.
In Tetris Beat, players will rotate and drop Tetriminos to the beat, keeping to the rhythm to build their biggest combo chain and score big. For Tetris fans looking for the traditional hit gameplay experience, they can try out the Marathon mode, where they can also choose the soundtrack.

name: Waver: A Typing Adventure
description: A combination typing test and rhythm game, featuring a story mode about touring fans, a typing speed test, and a series of endurance challenges for high score.

name: The Last Spark
description: Spark the Last Robot is a puzzle-platformer where the player controls Spark, a robot who must solve the trials of each room in order to dive deeper into the factory and work to figure out how to return electricity to his fellow robots.

name: Mario 64 and Yoshi
description: Mario 64 and Yoshi is a ROM hack/mod by Kaze Emanuar which adds rideable Yoshis to Super Mario 64.

name: Quake: Episode 6 - Dimension of the Machine
description: Dimension of the Machine is a brand new experience created by the MachineGames team. Continue your fight through brand new dimensions, figure out the secret to restarting the machine, and come face to face with an old foe.

name: Codex
description: A shared world adventure MMORPG which abandons absolute persistence in establishing shared story-telling with a beginning and an end.

name: Checkers for Kids
description: Checkers for Kids is a traditional and inspiring board game which attracts the attention of younger audience. There are lots of unique toys you can choose to play with and customize even further with your favorite addons. Black and white is too boring for you? Change up your playground however you want. And if you are tired and want to relax, just play with your pet fish which will cheer for you during your games against family and friends! If there's no one around to compete with, no need to worry: a skillful AI player will gladly play with you. To make it more accessible for players all over the world, the game offers a lot of settings to test all possible modes of checkers. Grab your favorite toy and improve your logic thinking while having fun!

name: Orbibot
description:
Orbibot is a game in which you control a ball-shaped robot and solve physics- and logic-based puzzles.

Being a ball doesn’t limit you as much, you can control buttons, laser switches, and doors to reach the end of the level. Sometimes you will need to use barrels or metal balls to get to your destination.

Will you find the teleporter that will take you to the next level?

name: Guess Picture
description: Find the image before your friends to win the game!

name: Never Return
description: Never Return is a 3D free-to-view randomised dungeon action game with light Roguelike elements. With a rich weapon and talent system, the game's real-time combat feels solid and varied, allowing players to build according to their own fighting style and gaming habits. every battle is a dizzying experience, and the challenge of random maps and enemies keeps going further and further.

name: Half Dead 3
description: Become a member of the highly anticipated sequel of the co-op sci-fi show. Gather a team of four friends. The more partners the more chances to survive. Find your way out in a deadly new room complex filled with even more sophisticated traps.

name: Alice Trapped Beyond Wonderland
description: Discover and solve the extraordinary mysteries from the magical kingdoms beyond the incredible Wonderland, Find where the evil red queen banished your friends, gather clues about their whereabouts, and solve multiple puzzles to rescue them once and for all to get them back to their home in Wonderland.

name: All Dream Long A Flower Storm
description: Award-winning point-and-click game FREE to download and play! Relax into a dreamscape full of fairytales, legends, and peculiar scenery. With the help of friendly demon Baku, solve riddles and puzzles to reach the true end and wake up... if you want to wake up, that is.

name: Ultimate Bumper Cars: Dodgems
description: Ultimate Bumper Cars is a realistic Bumper Car Simulator with multiplayer support and realistic physics. This brilliant attraction is fun for all ages. Dodgems or Bumper Cars will always be remembered as one of the longest running and most successful attractions in the amusement industry. No other ride can compete with Dodgems when it comes to family fun and entertainment. Bumper-to-bumper traffic never been this fun – or bumpy! Grab all your friends and family for fantastic fun on our classic Dodgems simulator game. Step into the dodgem arena, take control of your own dodgem car, and race around as you try to avoid the chaos! Jump into one of 16 cars, put your foot on the accelerator, and try to eliminate your rivals! But watch out for the guy behind you; he has a wild look in his eye!

name: City Driving Simulator 2
description: This isn't one of those fantasy scenarios, where cars behave like children's toys and all you have to do is drive as fast as you can. This is a game for true car enthusiasts. Select one of many meticulously rendered vehicles and take it for a spin in a lifelike environment. Cruise in the suburbs, tear through the city streets and show you have what it takes to call yourself a real driver.

name: Dragon and Home
description: Dragon and Home is a sandbox MMORPG where players can choose freely how they desire to play. Whether you want to play as a courageous adventurer, or you want to experience the tranquil rural lifestyles, growing plants, and feeding animals with your friends in the Homeland, you can find it all.

name: Futanari Vampire Girlfriend
description: After browsing a hookup app, you happen find your dream girl. A crazy-hot goth girl with a feisty attitude. Little do you know, that you're in way over your head.

name: Chupacabras: Night Hunt
description: Hunt the chupacabras alone or with your friends, explore the map and find the weapons to kill the monster.

name: Pill Puzzle 2
description: Business is good! In Pill Puzzle 2, you need to fit the right pills into the pack and also organize the bandages to be delivered to your customers.

name: {Undefined}
description: {Undefined} is a sandbox survival game like no other, set on life-sized voxel planets with realistic phyisics with the possibility to shape your own building blocks. From your custom made furniture, walls, crafting stations to vehicle parts. You shape the blocks which can then be used to build buildings, spacecraft and aircraft. Endless possibilites with as little limitations as possible!

name: Incel Syndrome
description: The abstract male is the image of God, the absolute some-thing.

name: Ghost of Tsushima: Iki Island
description: The Iki Island expansion pack comes with a new story, new characters, new environments to explore, new armour for Jin and his horse, new mini-games, new techniques, new enemy types, among other additions. Sucker Punch has also added new animals that Jin can pet.

name: Markus Ritter: The Lost Family
description: Play as Markus Ritter in this short full motion video game in the style of the famous 90's Point'n'Click games.

name: Help Me!
description: Become a psychiatrist, talk, counsel, and treat patients. Depending on your choices, the mini games and dialogues will change. Hurry up. Help Me! patients are waiting.

name: Ghost of Tsushima: Director's Cut
description:
Ghost of Tsushima: Director's Cut Includes:
- Full game.
- Iki Island expansion: New story, mini-games, enemy types and more.
- Legends online co-op mode.
- Digital mini art book by Dark Horse.
- Director’s commentary: The creative team sits down with a renowned Japanese historian to look at the world of Ghost of Tsushima and how it compares to the real-life events that inspired it.
- One Technique Point.
- Charm of Hachiman’s Favour.
- Hero of Tsushima Skin Set: Golden Mask, Sword Kit, Horse, Saddle.

name: Wrestledunk Sports
description: Wrestledunk is an explosive, colorful collection of super-competitive (or cooperative) multiplayer sports games! Couchslam your friends with full local and online multiplayer support for high-energy athletic action. Four sports, loads of arenas and modes, one champion!

name: Mouse adventure
description: 3D adventure, platformer. A mouse wants to help a mechanic to repair cheese machine.

name: Madden NFL 22
description: Madden NFL 22 is where gameday happens. All-new features in Franchise include staff management, an enhanced scenario engine, and weekly strategy. Share avatar progress and player class between Face of The Franchise and The Yard with unified progression.

name: Tavern of Gods
description: "Tavern of Gods" is a roguelite auto battle game. Players collect heroes, skills, followers, and equipment to form various builds to fight with random monsters. Every expedition can get new items, and then you can experience more different builds next time.

name: Creas
description: Creas is a contemporary/fantasy RPG that tells the story of a young man discovering the existence of creatures from his imagination. He now finds himself in a conflict that threatens the fate of humanity and he is the only hope for his survival…

name: Psycron
description: Psycron is a 2D action Metroidvania where you try and escape the deep space scientific research vessel Ceremos. Explore four wildly different areas as you fight strange enemies, acquire upgrades which change how you traverse the station and discover what happened to the crew of the Ceremos as you try to escape.

name: Fracked
description:
From the creators of Phantom: Covert Ops, Fracked is the trailblazing new VR action adventure that collides relentless gunfights with free running, skiing, and climbing.
Stranded in a remote mountain facility, you play as a reluctant hero forced into a final stand between the planet and a legion of interdimensional enemies. Take aim and run head-first into the action as you shoot, ski, and climb your way across an extreme adventure. Uncompromised, audacious, and stylish, Fracked grabs PS VR by the Moves and delivers an ass kicking VR game enhanced for PS5.

name: Twilight Memoria
description: Twilight Memoria Sun and Moon is an RPG game where you play as two kids living their daily life in the setting of fantasy full of monsters.

name: Shadowplay: Metropolis Foe
description: Take control of a band of lawless rebels, complete stealth missions, seek out rare cards, create your own souped up decks, and welcome all sorts of challenges in this strange and unique cyberpunk metropolis with battle and adventure around every corner!

name: Arietta of Spirits
description: Arietta of Spirits is a story-driven action-adventure game, following Arietta on her journey to unveil the mysteries of the Spirit Realm. Immerse yourself in a story filled with emotion and surprising turns.

name: Space Scavenger
description: Action roguelike where you build and command your own spaceships. Battle enemies, explore planets and customize your ship on the fly. Make the best use of the quirky ship modules you find, ranging from slingshots to ion cannons, to try and avoid certain death.

name: Typing Incremental
description: In Typing Incremental, type words to earn money, spend money to unlock new words. Repeat until you can prestige to gain permanent bonuses.

name: Quake
description: Sin descripción

name: Mr. Triangle Mania 2
description: Mr. Triangle Mania 2 is a platformer-shooter game with a stupid and wacky meme filled plot.

name: Everyday Today's Menu for Emiya Family: Lancer Scenario Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Dango Dash
description: Dango Dash is a platformer adventure game that combines fast-paced action with an engaging story about growing up and fighting for what you believe in. Help Dango in his quest to save his village and defeat the evil Hanami ninja clan threatening their peace.

name: Big's Big World
description: Oh no! Where did Froggy go this time? He's lost somewhere out in the big world. Play as Big the Cat and help reunite him with his pollywog pal in this open-world adventure.

name: G-Mode Archives+: Tondemo Nishibuuki 2 - Paris Boutard Rally
description:
Let's go to a retro world with a bubble-era feel! An unusual journey covering a total length of 10,000 miles between Paris and Boutard.

Tondemo Nishibouki 2 Paris-Boutaes Rally is one of the works of the Choicego Computer series, and is a racing action game created in the style of game software released for 8-bit hardware in 1991.

Choha-chan, the main character, has arrived at the western capital, TENJICK, and obtained money and fame. Although he has climbed the ladder of victory at the speed of light, his days are unstimulating. He felt something was missing.

One day, Hacchan is recognized for his driving skills and is entrusted with something by a racer. It was the right to participate in the world's No.1 phantom race, "Paris-Boutard Rally"...!

Use jumps and turbos to step on enemies, climb over cliffs, defeat unique bosses, and aim for victory! Don't miss the story full of bubbly tidbits and the retro-style instruction manual that can be viewed in-game.

The G-Mode website includes instructions to learn how to make 3D glasses that give a 3D view of the screen.

name: SRG Mixtape Volume #1
description: Super Rare Mixtape Vol. 1 is a physical indie game collection including 30 games and 6 demos. Packaged as a USB drive shaped like cassette tape with only a limited number sold.

name: Pokémon Inclement Emerald
description:
Pokémon Inclement Emerald is a romhack of Pokémon Emerald.
Inclement Emerald is started out as a binary hack back in 2018, and has since been redone from scratch using the pokeemerald decompilation project. It's intended to offer a modern, more challenging take on the Hoenn region, and is full of quality-of-life improvements, new systems that streamline Pokémon training, and extra events.

name: Metal Slug: Commander
description: Sin descripción

name: Train Sim World 2: Rush Hour - Boston Sprinter
description: Experience the fastest rail line in America, from modern suburbia to sprawling countryside, linking the state capitals of Massachusetts and Rhode Island, in command of both Amtrak Regional and MBTA Commuter operations with Train Sim World 2: Rush Hour - Boston Sprinter.

name: Payblood
description:
Payblood is a fighting game with pixel graphics.

Made in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare 44 Game Jam.
Theme: Your Life is Currency

name: Jolly Roger
description: A short BL Visual Novel about romance and pirates. Spanish and English available.

name: Zaccaria Pinball: Zankor Deluxe Pinball Table
description: Zankor Deluxe is the next Zaccaria table with a fully animated color display. It also features more modern pinball elements.

name: Megania Online
description: Megania online is a fantasy medieval world set in the Age of Dragons. Many adventures and puzzles await you, but you will also have to face players in clan wars, mythological creatures, monster raids, powerful final bosses ...

name: Detective VR: NFT Secret Files
description: The mysterious missing of a collector challenges you to start your own investigation. Explore secret locations, pick up details like a detective, build logic chains and solve riddles. Use vintage gadgets and incredible alchemical compounds. Resist the digital spirits of the NFT. Be careful!

name: Hitler Hates Anime
description: Take Adolf Hitler under your control and with the power of mighty dildo destroy all naughty anime girls!

name: EXS1 EthnologySister: Cultural functionalism
description: Sin descripción

name: Phantasy Star Online 2 New Genesis: Aelio Nadar Deluxe Edition
description: Contains the Aelio Nadar swimsuit outfit, perfect for the stunning beaches of Aelio, as well as various support items. This is a great bargain, which can only be purchased once per each platform!

name: Phantasy Star Online 2 New Genesis: Aelio Nager Deluxe Edition
description: Contains the Aelio Nager swimsuit outfit, perfect for the stunning beaches of Aelio, as well as various support items. This is a great bargain, which can only be purchased once per each platform!

name: Train Sim World 2: Rush Hour - Deluxe Edition
description:
Be in control!
As platforms fill with passengers and rail traffic increases to meet the growing demand, rush hour begins. Take control of packed trains and navigate the busy network, constantly being checked by signals as you wind your way through station after station - Fighting to keep to time and avoid costly delays with Train Sim World 2: Rush Hour.

name: Darker Skies
description: The War is over, but the effects linger. Take control of Jack, a survivor of the War of the Worlds trying to rebuild a working Heat Ray to blow his way to freedom and light the spark that will rebuild civilization.

name: AE Supernatural
description: The five protagonists experienced different supernatural events, after exploration, may find the truth, but also may die.

name: Kursor
description: In this game, the ball chases the mouse cursor, so you'll have to overcome the inertia of movement and a multitude of obstacles. Innovative gameplay, simple controls but difficult to master! This is Kursor.

name: Fear Corporation
description: Fear Corporation [/ b] - This is a game about the hero's fear of his phobias, the hero is terribly afraid of clowns, statues and dolls. Waking up from a nightmare at night, the hero begins to realize that he is still in a dream, because he observes all his most terrible nightmares.

name: Ransack Raccoon
description: Avoid menacing spotlights while running around stores in a shopping mall and stealing everything in sight.

name: Branches
description: Branches is an arcade scoring runner game.

name: Shape Suitable
description: This is your free canvas. Let's draw freely and enjoy the puzzle! For "Shapes" who carry various things Draw a bridge, draw a wall, and sometimes protect yourself from bad guys! "Shapes" are rich in individuality, and some are tall,powerful, flying in the sky like a UFO. There is no right answer to clear, let's help Shapes with your free ideas. If the puzzle is difficult, you can worry with your family If you still can't clear it, you can look at the hints!

name: Girls Tank Battle
description: The survival of girls who have fallen into a four-dimensional world begins. When you clear the stage, you select one of the three skills to challenge the next stage with your own strategy. ・ A tank battle that relieves stress with explosive direction begins. The exciting new-sense tank shooting game with simple manipulation! You can collect new military costumes of cute girls every five stages. Defeat the final boss and enjoy the images of all the girls in gallery mode.

name: Arcade Archives: Vandyke
description: Vandyke is an action game released by UPL in 1990. Players use weapons including swords, boomerangs, bombs, and flails to defeat enemies and bosses as they progress. Your character will also gain attack power and strike a heroic pose when you pick up meat items, so be sure to use these to your advantage!

name: Blood for Poppies
description: Uncover the dark and tortured legacy of mad science in this psychological horror interactive novel about entrapment and the lingering echoes of trauma.

name: Quake
description: In addition to support for modern systems and improved rendering techniques, this remastered version includes both mission packs, Scourge of Armagon and Dissolution of Eternity. It also includes two episodes created by MachineGames: the previously-released Dimension of the Past and a new one called Dimension of the Machine.

name: One: The Card Game
description: One: The Card Game is a free multiplayer online alternative based on the popular game UNO. Play One: The Card Game straight from your browser and share the link with friends and family.

name: The Vale: Shadow of the Crown
description: A sightless warrior's world is that of intimate detail: an enemy's rasping breath, a foot shifting on swampy ground, the crack of steel on leather. The Vale is an audio-based action adventure game that sets out to breathe new life into medieval combat.

name: Monster Train First Class
description: Monster Train brings a new strategic layer to roguelike deckbuilding, with a tactical twist: defend not one, but three vertical battlegrounds simultaneously as you fight to protect the final pyre against the forces of heaven. No playthrough is ever the same, it’s a fresh challenge every time. You’ll never play the same deck twice! Hell has frozen over. Only you can protect the final burning pyre from the forces of heaven and restore the inferno. To take back hell, you’ll need to power up. Choose your route carefully, different locations yield different benefits. Upgrade your champion, gain Pact Shards and their benefits, recruit powerful units, upgrade cards, gain passive bonuses, or duplicate any card in your deck. Strategize to Fit Your Playstyle With six clans to choose from, each has its own unique and surprising gameplay. Pick your primary and supporting clan to gain access to all cards from both. During your run you will be able to improve cards by mixing and matching upgrades to open up new roads to victory. You can even duplicate your favorite card at special map nodes before facing off against the final boss. The Last Divinity If you have gained 100 or more Pact Shards when you defeat Seraph, a final battle unlocks and you can face – The Last Divinity! Hell Rush - Multiplayer In the Hell Rush multiplayer mode, eight players compete in a frantic real-time contest. Only a true speed demon can remain undefeated. You will never play the same deck twice!

name: Spawn Kings
description: Spawn Kings is a turn-based monster collecting fantasy RPG in which you are given the freedom on how you wish to level and progress through the game whether it be through completing quest or battling wild monsters.

name: Train Sim World 2: Rush Hour
description: Take control of packed trains and navigate the busy network, constantly being checked by signals as you wind your way through station after station - Fighting to keep to time and avoid costly delays. Train Sim World 2: Rush Hour is the ultimate test of nerve and skill.

name: Dungeoneers
description: Dragons have been attacking the village, then retreating to their dungeon lair. Send in the Human Swordsman, Dwarven Brawler, or Elven Huntress - swapping them as needed. BEWARE: You will encounter hex grids, poly dice, and turn-based combat.

name: Street Striker
description: Street Striker is an arcade game about street fighting. Choose your hero and arena, find weapons, or use your hand-to-hand combat skills to stand up against waves of bandits and complete the level.

name: Football Academy Clicker
description: Football Academy Clicker is a clicker game where you train footballers and lead your team to glory. Transfer new players and train them. Sell your players at high prices to increase your budget. Upgrade your stadium and hire coaches. 5 leagues waiting for you to conquer!

name: Magnesium 173
description: Magnesium_173 is an elegant puzzle game inspired by quantum mechanics. Discard your conventional understanding of time and explore what it takes to make a meaningful choice.

name: Yuoni
description: Yuoni is a first-person narrative horror game that whisks you away to a sunset-stained world to play a deadly game of hide and seek. As grade-schooler Ai, navigate authentic Japanese environments and utilise every hiding space you can find to survive the horrors ahead. And if they find you… run.

name: Phantasy Star Online 2 New Genesis: Limited Edition
description:
One of the goals for Phantasy Star Online 2 New Genesis is to create the ultimate PSO2 in which the time-tested elements are kept intact, while the game design, gameplay, and graphics engine will be completely redesigned and reborn in all aspects. We are working very hard to offer players unparalleled character customization, limitless adventure, and the best action online RPG.

The limited edition includes:
- Phantasy Star Online 2: New Genesis
- Mini Soundtrack
- Special Illustrated Box

name: Error
description: A corrupted version of Portal that I've somehow managed to get...

name: Rims Racing
description: The first motorbike simulation that combines a realistic racing challenge with engineering and mechanics! Ride the world's most powerful motorbikes and optimise their performance by swapping out parts and analysing data in real time.

name: BlackberryNova
description: BlackberryNova: A yuri visual novel about a girl whom graduated from high school and is now preparing herself as she enters college.

name: Blackout: The Darkest Night
description:
A Choose Your Own Adventure inspired by White Wolf’s World of Darkness, Twin Peaks and H.P. Lovecraft.

You have been part of something terrible, something so unspeakable that caused you to blackout and forget all recent events. Now you have the choice of pursuing this dark truth or trying to bury it in the past.

Maybe it’s not too late to turn back now.

name: Recompile
description: Explore the birth of sapient AI in this atmospheric hacking adventure set in the sprawling world of Recompile.

name: Twelve Minutes
description: Twelve Minutes is a real-time top-down interactive thriller with an accessible click and drag interface. Featuring James McAvoy, Daisy Ridley, and Willem Dafoe. The game blends the dream-like tension of The Shining with the claustrophobia of Rear Window and the fragmented structure of Memento.

name: Drift Apocalypse
description:
The arcade game where you DRIFT to SURVIVE.
How many zombies can you exterminate before the end of the world?

name: Animal Crossing: New Leaf - Welcome Luxury
description: Animal Crossing: Welcome Luxury is a luxurious mod, to make the game more beautiful, comfortable and easier.

name: SMWC Island
description: Sin descripción

name: Astronaut Bundle
description:
The bundle contains:

- Laser rifle: The V-23 Eraser
- Stasis pistol: The V-40 Suspender
- Machete: The V-27 Shifter
- Outfit: The V-9 Defender Suit
- Buggy skin: The V-39 Star Rover
